title: The difference between disconnecting and rage quitting

replies.body: The difference = If teammates are absolute noobs and don't surrender, I just go farm the jungle. That's the difference.

I know its frustrating, but in the end, a leave is a leave. You are still negatively impacting the games of 9 other players, whether it be intentionally or not.

Leaverbuster penalties are usually not distributed after a one off leave (unless in ranked, as ranked is treated harsher).
If you have been leaverbusted, it means that you are constantly triggering the _automated_ system. Whether this be due to outside commitments or a crappy internet/computer. 

Although it may seem unfair, getting penalised for these kinds of things gives the person time to consider a couple of things.

* Is it time to upgrade their computer?
* Is it time to upgrade their internet?
* Are they starting games when they don't have a full hour to commit?
* Are they inclined to rage quit when things go bad?


If you would like, you can read more about the leaver buster system [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)
